docs.text: Yuyang Wang alwyuyang@gmail.com Research interests Cybersickness Computer-human interaction Cognitive systems Education November 2017 - now - PhD candidate Arts et metiers institute of technology, France October 2019 - September 2020 - Visiting PhD student Institute for Information Management in Engineering, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, Germany September 2015 - July 2017 - Master on numerical methods in engineering International Centre for Numerical Methods in Engineering, Polytechnic University of Catalonia, Spain September 2011 - July 2015 - Bachelor of non-woven materials in engineering, summa cum laude College of Textile and Clothing Engineering, Soochow University, China Funding and Awards October 2019 - September 2020 - Mobility scholarship from the Frenco-German institute for the industry of future January 2020 - June 2020 - Erasmus+ mobility grant from HESAM Université Computer skills C#, Python, Latex, Matlab, C++ Voluntary work Reviewer of international conferences: IEEE VR, IEEE ISMAR, ACM VRST Reviewer of international journals: Industria Textila Journal Hobbies Piano Publications
